Content.Name: Password Change Process
Content.Title: Password Change Process
Content.BodyCopy:
Why should I change my password?

  • For security reasons we need to use good practices of changing passwords often, and not sharing them with others.
  • For more info check out our University policy: Computer and Data Security (8-4)

How do I change/update my password?

Start by clicking on the very first link of this tutorial if you have not done so previously, or jump to the appropriate step as necessary.

If you just recently changed your BYU-Idaho password on a Windows OS computer (wired or wireless), you may jump back to that screen by following the Resume button, or jump to step 4.0 below.
